property.name: Type
property.value: Neo Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: {NEO EVOLUTION}: You may put it on one of your Light creatures. (If a creature is under it, treat it as a Neo Evolution Creature.) {KIZUNA COMP} (Whenever this creature attacks, you may use any number of your creature's Kizuna abilities.) Choose one of your creatures. That creature can't be destroyed until the start of your next turn.

property.value: Judgment Emblem

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Choose up to 2 of your opponent's creatures. For each chosen creature, choose one of your opponent's shields. Put those creatures on top of those shields face up. ■ After you cast this spell from your hand, put it on top of one of your shields face up instead of your graveyard. (Each stack is considered one shield).

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SUPER SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost. Then if you have no shields, you may use this card's Super Shield Trigger ability.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the card on the bottom of your deck into your hand. {SUPER}: When you put this creature into the battle zone, your opponent chooses 3 of their creatures, adds one of them to their hand, one into their mana zone and one on the bottom of their deck.

property.name: Race

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SUPER SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost. Then if you have no shields, you may use this card's Super Shield Trigger ability.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may cast a spell from your hand that costs 3 or less for no cost. {SUPER}: When you put this creature into the battle zone, this turn, your creatures don't leave the battle zone and get 'Blocker' until the start of your next turn. (You may tap a creature that has "blocker" to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to that creature.)

(The stack is still considered one shield.)

property.name: Race
property.value: Master DG/Metallica

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. From among them, add all Metallica, Dragons and spells into your hand and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. ■ At the end of your turn, you may cast a Judgment Emblem from your hand for no cost. ■ At the end of your turn, if there is a total of 3 or more face up cards in any shield zone, you may destroy this creature. If you do, put a light dragon from your hand into the battle zone.
